reference.title: Reference
reference.description: The reference given to the new billing period

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date, starting which, the billing period is going to be active. Should be in UTC.

stop_date.title: Stop Date
stop_date.description: The date, starting which, the billing period will become inactive. Should be UTC. If it is left empty, the billing period will never turn inactive, once activated.

portal_type.title: Portal Type
portal_type.description: The type of message in the ClearRoad ERP5 instance. Only one type possible
